import { Timeline, Text } from '@mantine/core'; import './styles.css'; import '../../App.css'; function TimelineComponent() { return (

Experience

Started as a Junior Software Engineer Intern and then worked as a Software Engineer I in TangoCode I worked in agile software projects and web development related to Digital Marketing in the product Chassis. 2020 - 2022 Adjunct proffesor in the course of Discrete Mathematics in Universidad ORT Uruguay. 2020 Volunteering in problem formulation and selection, and jury for the Uruguayan National Mathematical Olympiads. Also participated as jury in the international Olimpíada Matemática Rioplatense alongside world-class Professors in Mathematics. 2019 - Present Lectured Mathematical Olimpiad Seminaries in Universidad ORT and Universidad de Montevideo. Also weekly workshops in PREU High School. 2019 - 2020
); } export default TimelineComponent;
